file.title: Id user

p.text: For each computer generates it ID , on the basis of entries in the registry. Change the operating system and hardware on the machine in most cases NOT affect on the ID, but still there are exceptions.

p.textAll: User ID always different: it is now "2323243 ...", then" 432532320 ...". But this should not confuse you. Encrypted content remains the same , only changes the shape submission.
